mapper.select: SELECT REQUEST_ID AS requestId ,ORDER_ID AS orderId ,ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus ,TO_CHAR(REQUEST_REG_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH:MI:SS') AS requestRegDate ,TO_CHAR(REQUEST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD HH:MI:SS') AS requestUpdateDate ,REQUEST_TYPE AS requestType ,PRODUCT_NAME AS productName ,USER_ID AS userId ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_REQUEST WHERE REQUEST_ID = 'DELIVERY' || ORDER_ID AND ORDER_ID = A.ORDER_ID) AS deliveryCount FROM ORDER_REQUEST A WHERE ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus} ORDER BY REQUEST_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_DETAIL SET ORDER_STATUS = #{status} WHERE ORDER_ID = (SELECT ORDER_ID FROM ORDER_REQUEST WHERE REQUEST_ID = #{requestId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_REQUEST SELECT 'DELIVERY' || ORDER_ID AS REQUEST_ID ,ORDER_ID ,'PD' AS ORDER_STATUS ,REQUEST_REG_DATE ,FN_GET_KST_DATE() AS REQUEST_UPDATE_DATE ,'DELIVERY' AS REQUEST_TYPE ,PRODUCT_NAME ,USER_ID FROM ORDER_REQUEST WHERE 1=1 AND REQUEST_ID = #{requestId}
